LanguageData.MF_UseUpperLevelRenderer: Use top view renderer on upper levels (Restart required)
LanguageData.MF_UseUpperLevelRendererTooltip: Render from top to bottom on upper levels that you can see things on lower levels. Dynamic things and pawns are not visible.
LanguageData.MF_BlurringLowerLevelsTooltip: Add blurring effects to lower levels when rendering upper levels.
LanguageData.MF_FixedCameraVerticalTransitionTooltip: Hotkeys will switch levels with current camera position and zoom size.
LanguageData.MF_SortMapByLevelInColonistBar: Sort maps by level in colonist bar (Restart required)
LanguageData.MF_AllowsGatheringsOnOtherLevels: Allow gatherings on other levels (Restart required)
LanguageData.MF_AllowsGatheringsOnOtherLevelsTooltip: When turned off, gatherings like party and concert will only happen on the ground.
LanguageData.MF_GenerateRocksOnUpperLevelsTooltip: Generate random rocks for mountain to simulate hill continuation. Might increase the loading time of your save.
LanguageData.MF_GenerateBasementWithoutCaves: Flood fill whole map on upper levels
LanguageData.MF_GenerateBasementWithoutCavesTooltip: Upper floors are built on top of the roofs of the lower levels. To avoid freezing the game in mountainous biomes, expansion is limited to a maximum of 9 sections (17×17 cells) centered around the staircase.
When enabled, basements will only generate with rocks and possible ores.
LanguageData.MF_SetLivingLevelWhenAssigningBed: Set living level when assigning bed
LanguageData.MF_SetOtherLevelWhenAssigningBed: Also set joy and diet level when assigning bed
LanguageData.MF_RedirectIntervalDesc: Pawns would be redirected to their living/diet/joy level when their need is low. If they move to other levels, don't redirect them immediately.
LanguageData.MF_FlipStairDestinationCellTooltip: Stairs are designed as Z shape. If you have retexture mod that flips it, you can turn this on to spawn pawns on the correct destination.
LanguageData.MF_HeatExchangeEfficiencyDesc: Heat would be exchanged through stairs. Configure how fast they should synchronize between two rooms.
LanguageData.MF_ExchangeIntervalMultiplierDesc: Power, heat, gas will be exchanged between levels on a regular basis. But you can make it rarer.
LanguageData.MF_AutoTransferIntervalMultiplierDesc: Transfer "orders" will also be added periodically once you set them in Transfer tab of stairs.
LanguageData.MF_UsePrioritizedScanner: Use prioritized cross-level work scanner (Restart required)
LanguageData.MF_UsePrioritizedScannerTooltip: For cases when you have lots of potential low priority works on current map, but want pawns to do high-priority works on other levels first. Check Floors tab for more information.
LanguageData.MF_WorkGiverHighPriorityThresholdDesc: Works with higher or equal priority to this cutoff would be evaluated on all levels before low-priority works on pawns' current map.
LanguageData.MF_AddStayOnCurrentMapGizmo: Add a gizmo to restrict a pawn to always stay on current level. (Restart required)
LanguageData.MF_UseExperimentalHaulingTooltip: Without using transfer settings or policies, pawns will automatically haul haulables not in stockpiles or in lower-priority stockpiles to a feasible one on other levels. Alternatively, you can turn this off and use transfer settings and policies to fully control the hauling.
LanguageData.MF_ConfirmDeleteConnectedLevel: [Dangerous!!!]Deleting the connected level will permanently remove everything on it and any levels branching from it. Are you sure you want to proceed?
LanguageData.MF_AutoTransferToggleDesc: If enabled, the stair will periodically scan for permitted items (within the maximum range specified in the Transfer Policy) and add them to the load list. Pawns will haul them from current level to the connected level automatically.
LanguageData.MF_BuildUpperElevatorDesc: Elevators must be built on the same cell to function. Place a blueprint on the upper level.
LanguageData.MF_BuildLowerElevatorDesc: Elevators must be built on the same cell to function. Place a blueprint on the lower level.
LanguageData.MF_LinkElevatorDesc: Link all elevators on this cell so pawns can move between each other.
LanguageData.MF_PrintStairsToggleDesc: Turn it off to make stairs invisible.
LanguageData.MF_ExclusiveStairsStorageSettingsTooltip: When toggled on, it will automatically disallow all currently allowed things on the connected stairs to prevent hauling back and forth.
LanguageData.MF_StairNotConnectedToPowerNet: Not connected to power net. Connect them with power conduit.
LanguageData.MF_AllPowerNetNetOutput: Net power output in connected nets: {0}W
LanguageData.MF_TransferPolicyTabSearchDesc: Search def, click on them to add an entry in policy
LanguageData.MF_TransferPolicyTabEntryTooltip: The stairs will periodically search for the allowed items in Transfer settings and automatically add them to the transfer list. You can prevent overloading or unnecessary transfers by setting a max amount here. If the resource counter on the target level shows that there are enough of an item, it won’t add that item to the transfer list anymore. Conversely, a negative setting will keep the appropriate number of items on current level and transfer the rest to the target level.
LanguageData.MF_TransferPolicyCountEverythingTooltip: When toggle off, it only count items in the stockpile.
LanguageData.MF_RoomTooSmall: Room size is too small. Must be at least {0} cells.
LanguageData.MF_MustBeBuiltIndoor: Must be built indoor and under the roof.
LanguageData.MF_CantBuildDownStairAboveGround: Can't build downstairs on upper levels.
LanguageData.MF_CantBuildDownStairInCurrentBiome: Can't build downstairs in current biome.
LanguageData.MF_CantBuildInSameRoom: Can't build same kind of stair in the same room.
LanguageData.MF_DesignatorHaulToDestMapDesc: Mark items to be hauled to a specific level.
LanguageData.MF_MustSelectTargetViaRightClickFirst: Must select destination through right click options first.
LanguageData.MF_NoAppropriateBedOnCurrentLevel: No appropriate bed on this level.
LanguageData.MF_StayOnCurrentMapToggleDesc: Pawns wouldn't search for jobs or switch to other levels when toggle on.
LanguageData.MF_ListenBillGiverTooltip: Pawns won’t automatically haul missing ingredients across levels. However, when toggled on, the workbench will automatically scan for missing ingredients on the linked level and add them to the haul queue. The performance impact depends on how many types are allowed in the bill filter, so try to keep it as minimal as possible. Turn if off if you have a dedicated stockpile on this level and it would do nothing.
LanguageData.MF_BillGiverLinkedMapTooltip: Link with other level so pawns could haul missing ingredients from there.
LanguageData.MF_GatherPawnsCommandDesc: Call colonists to move to the current spot.
LanguageData.MF_BuildUpperPipeConnectorDesc: Place a blueprint of a pipe connector on the upper level.
LanguageData.MF_LinkUpperPipeConnectorDesc: Link current connector with the one on the upper level. So they can transmit resources between each other.
LanguageData.MF_BuildLowerPipeConnectorDesc: Place a blueprint of a pipe connector on the lower level.
LanguageData.MF_LinkLowerPipeConnectorDesc: Link current connector with the one on the lower level. So they can transmit resources between each other.
LanguageData.MF_PipeConnectorExportingDesc: If toggle, the connector will transmit resources to linked connector on other level. Otherwise, it receive resources from others.
LanguageData.MF_SetPipeNetDefDesc: Select which resource the connector should transmit.
LanguageData.MF_CannotFindPipeNetWithDef: Cannot find nearby pipe net of {0}.
LanguageData.MF_ReconnectToPipeNetDesc: Reconnect to a nearby pipe net after you modify it.
LanguageData.MF_NotConnectedToPipeNet: Not working: not connected to any pipe net.
LanguageData.MF_ConnectedToEmptyPipeNet: Not working: exporter connected to an empty pipe net. Please reconnect it to a pipe net of {0} with containers.
LanguageData.MF_NotLinkedWithPipeConnector: Not working: link with another pipe connector first.
LanguageData.MF_LinkedPipeConnectorNotConnectedToPipe: Not working: linked pipe connector not connected to pipe net.
LanguageData.MF_NoContainerInReceiverNet: Not working: no container in receiver pipe net.
LanguageData.MF_HighPriorityWorkGiverTypes: Following works would be scanned on pawn's current level, then other levels\n
LanguageData.MF_LowPriorityWorkGiverTypes: If not found, following works would be scanned on pawn's current level, then other levels\n
